channel.title: CVE Feed for NLnet Labs -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NLnet Labs -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-39915|2024-09-11T15:36:54.043Z -- nlnet%20labs -- routinator
item.description: NLnet Labs' Routinator up to and including version 0.12.1 may crash when trying to parse certain malformed RPKI objects. This is due to insufficient input checking in the bcder library covered by CVE-2023-39914.

item.title: CVE-2023-39914|2024-09-11T15:34:05.255Z -- nlnet%20labs -- bcder
item.description: NLnet Labs' bcder library up to and including version 0.7.2 panics while decoding certain invalid input data rather than rejecting the data with an error. This can affect both the actual decoding stage as well as accessing content of types that utilized delayed decoding.
